function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on specific operating conditions for UV-C system efficiency","Impact":"Reduction in UV-C system efficiency in non-ideal operating conditions","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough analysis of operating environments and conditions to optimize UV-C system design","Technologies":"Amalgam technology for temperature stabilization, variable dimensioning of technical parameters","People":"HVAC system users, building occupants","Owner":"HVAC system designers, engineers"},{"Description":"Limited efficiency of conventional T8 fluorescent tubes in UV-C range","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of UV-C system in using conventional T8 fluorescent tubes","Mitigation":"Utilize fluorescent lamps with amalgam technology for temperature stabilization","Technologies":"Amalgam technology, smaller dimensions, higher specific power per cm2 of lamp body area","People":"HVAC system users, building occupants","Owner":"HVAC system designers, engineers"},{"Description":"Dependence of UV-C system efficiency on air flow resistance and mechanical effects on lamps","Impact":"Decreased UV-C system efficiency due to air flow resistance and mechanical effects on lamps","Mitigation":"Design fluorescent lamps with smaller dimensions and higher specific power per cm2 of lamp body area","Technologies":"Smaller dimensions, higher specific power per cm2 of lamp body area, amalgam technology for temperature stabilization","People":"HVAC system users, building occupants","Owner":"HVAC system designers, engineers"}]}
